item.title: Trump ties Greenland takeover bid to Nobel Prize in text to Norway leader
item.description: Trump’s push to take over Greenland and unleash a trade war with European nations has sparked the greatest transatlantic crisis in generations.

item.title: Gov. Shapiro, a top 2028 contender, recounts chat with Trump, beef with Harris in new book
item.description: Takeaways from a new memoir that could help frame a presidential run.

item.title: Trump administration backs labor secretary facing misconduct probe
item.description: The accusations have caught the attention of the business community in Washington, which supports the agency’s priorities under Lori Chavez-DeRemer.
